set(target "opencv_ptest")

file(GLOB hdrs "*/*.h" "*/*.hpp")
file(GLOB srcs "*/*.cpp")

include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include")
add_library(${target} STATIC ${srcs})

target_link_libraries(${target})
